explanation: [0-0] On a bamboo mat on a countertop, there is a glass of yellow liquid drink, a box of fries, and two packets of sauce.

[0-6] First, a left hand picks up the drink, and the right hand opens the lid. Then, the right hand pinches the upper edge of the cup and lifts it, revealing another identical cup underneath. The two cups are nested together. Next, the right hand takes the cup containing the drink, revealing a piece of fried chicken in the other cup. The chicken piece is then poured out onto the hand and broken open, revealing a coin inside. The chicken piece is then put down, and both hands hold the coin.
